outline:
1. what is conspicuous, what is in front of
  2. in front of, straight forward, before, in sight of
  3. in front of oneself, straightforward
  4. before your face, in your view or purpose
  5. what is in front of, corresponding to
  6. in front of, before
  7. in the sight or presence of
  8. parallel to
  9. over, for
  10. in front, opposite
  11. at a distance
  12. from the front of, away from
  13. from before the eyes of, opposite to, at a distance from
  14. from before, in front of
  15. as far as the front of
kjv_def: about, (over) against, [idiom] aloof, [idiom] far (off), [idiom] from, over, presence, [idiom] other side, sight, [idiom] to view.
strongs_def: a front, i.e. part opposite; specifically a counterpart, or mate; usually (adverbial, especially with preposition) over against or before
